verbs.description: [ARG0: Filmmaker Spike Lee] [V: launched] [ARG1: into a profanity - laced tirade against President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: while promoting his film “ BlaKkKlansmen ” at the Cannes Film Festival in France this week] .

[ARG0: Filmmaker Spike Lee] launched into a profanity - laced tirade against President Donald Trump while [V: promoting] [ARG1: his film “ BlaKkKlansmen ”] [ARGM-LOC: at the Cannes Film Festival in France] [ARGM-TMP: this week] .
